pages.text: Orange, which represents warmth, can be used to do the most interesting things. Like your invention here.$(br2)Unlike a normal fishing rod, this piece is much more sturdy and can fish where a common rod fails. I wonder what you can bring to the surface?

pages.text: $(italic)Caution, hot!$()$(br)With this flaming fishing hook you can not only burn your fingers...
